name: Plant Names in Latin Quiz | Sci / Tech | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Carnation.

	Dianthus is also the family name of the Pink group of flowers

Geranium.

	In herbalism, Geranium essence is supposed to relieve anxiety.

Kumquat.

	Grown in Greece among other countries

Oak.

	Quercus is an ancient latin name for Oak tree, found in the work of Horace and other classical writers.

Chysanthenum.

	The chrysanthenum is the symbol of the royal family of Japan. They have the Imperial Order of the Chrysanthemum and a National Chrysanthemum Day, and the Emperor sits on the Chrysanthenum Throne.

Potato.

	Not to be confused with sweet potatoes (Ipomea batatas)

Columbine.

	Different varieties of Aquilegia flourish from the Himalayas to the USA

Lily of the Valley.

	Lily of the valley is a pretty wild flower with white blooms and narrow leaves, popular for wedding bouquets

Gorse.

	Gorse is a wild bushy yellow-flowered European shrub
